Record.ClassificationPath: Male Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Urinary Tract Infections/Schistosomiasis haematobia
Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Urinary Tract Infections/Schistosomiasis haematobia
Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Infection/Urinary Tract Infections/Schistosomiasis haematobia
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A human disease caused by the infection of parasitic worms SCHISTOSOMA HAEMATOBIUM. It is endemic in AFRICA and parts of the MIDDLE EAST. Tissue damages most often occur in the URINARY TRACT, specifically the URINARY BLADDER.
